page.title: 04Entertainment
page.content: A common pastime during a normal evening is to watch Television pogrammes at home. Apart from favourite regular programmes people also make use of Video Cassette recordings, by means of which they can watch a special programme _ a very long film which is the story of a book. People can also make a recording of a programme whilst they are away from the Television set _ the machine will switch itself on, record a programme and switch itself on, record a programme and switch off at pre_set times. Thus, whilst you mat wish to see a particular programme, but also need to attend a function whilst the programme is being broadcast, the video will record a programme so that you may view it sometime later.
